section.title: GetHostList
section.para: GetHostList returns the host list objects for the given management system GUID. Use an asterisk ("*") as the emsGuid to return all hosts.

formalpara.title: Examples
formalpara.para: The following examples demonstrate GetHostList usage:

example.title: GetHostList () WSDL
example.programlisting: <message name="GetHostList"> <part name="emsGuid" type="xsd:string" /> </message> <message name="GetHostListResponse"> <part name="return" type="typens:VmdbwsSupport..HostListArray" /> </message> ... <xsd:complexType name="VmdbwsSupport..HostList"> <xsd:all> <xsd:element name="guid" type="xsd:string" /> <xsd:element name="name" type="xsd:string" /> </xsd:all> </xsd:complexType>

example.title: GetHostList Output (Windows PowerShell)
example.screen: Calling GetHostList... guid name ---- ---- d2b0be78-d32c-11df-954a-000c29f67b01 VI4ESX12.galaxy.local d124eaac-d32c-11df-954a-000c29f67b01 vi4esx11.galaxy.local
